files.README.md:
[//]: # (START: HEADER)

# Welcome to Fusebit!

This is a Fusebit integration, to be used as part of the Fusebit service!


[//]: # (END: HEADER)


[//]: # (IMPORT: DESCRIPTION)

A simple <% global.consts.feed.name %> hello world example.


[//]: # (START: SIGNUP)

# Sign up for Fusebit Now!

If you want to sign up for Fusebit to simplify your integrations, go to
[https://fusebit.io](https://fusebit.io) now!.


[//]: # (END: SIGNUP)



[//]: # (START: RUNNING)

Open up your browser to <% global.consts.endpoint %>/v2/account/<% global.consts.accountId %>/subscription/<%
global.consts.subscriptionId %>/integration/<% global.consts.integrationId %>/api/startup to
test the integration!


[//]: # (END: RUNNING)
